TEXT: e1: Supermarkets and shopping centres should be allowed to open on any Sundays and holidays.

TEXT: e2: This may be a change for the employees that cannot to be implemented easily.
e3: However, especially for working customers this would mean greater flexibility and fewer nerve-racking peak times during the week.

TEXT: e4: Considering the growing digitization of society, the traditional model of the weekend will soon be obsolete.
